hanzi-su-wiki:
続

Значения

Продолжаться, длиться; продолжать; связывать, наращивать, преемственность

Мнемоника

  • Нити 糸 одежды, бросающиеся в глаза, выставленные напоказ 売, т.е. оборванные.

  • "Я продолжаю продавать 売 нити 糸."

Варианты

續, 续
purpleculture_pinyin:
xù
Japanese variant of 续
Японский вариант продолжения
rtega_mnemonic:
續續RS
续续		続continue, carry on, succeed
  • a line 糸 of merchants 売 continuing to sell 賣/卖 their goods
heisig_constituent: continue, thread, spiderman, sell, samurai, crown, human legs
koohiiStory1: If you attach strings to the things you sell, you will be able to continue making profit from them even after the fact.
koohiiStory2: Even though Peter Parker has become Spiderman, he continues to sell pictures that he takes as a photographer.
onYomi: ゾク、ショク、コウ、キョウ
kunYomi: つづ.く、つづ.ける、つぐ.ない
jp_example_words:
持続(じぞく): continuation
接続詞(せつぞくし): conjunction
存続(そんぞく): duration, continuance
継続(けいぞく): continuation
接続(せつぞく): connection, union, join, link, changing trains
相続(そうぞく): succession, inheritance
続々(ぞくぞく): successively, one after another
続き(つづき): sequel, continuation
手続き(てつづき): procedure, (legal) process, formalities
連続(れんぞく): serial, consecutive, continuity, occurring in succession, continuing
続く(つづく): continue (to be the case), keep up
続ける(つづける): continue, go on, follow
jp_readingExamples: 続く (つづ.く), 続ける (つづ.ける)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You have to sell thread if you want to continue to live. You want to make a living don’t you? Make sure you continue to sell that thread every single day!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine selling thread so you can continue living your life.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You have to continue to sell that thread because a Bosozoku (ぞく) bike gang is forcing you to do it. You see? If you want to continue to live, you have to appease this Bosozoku gang. You better keep selling!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Continue selling thread and paying off the Bosozoku. It’s the only way you can continue to survive!
Ru_Radicals: 儿 (ножки), 冖 (ва), 士 (воин), 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 糸 (нить)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the thread (糸) sells (売) continuously

яп. вм. 续

続

Значения

Продолжаться, длиться; продолжать; связывать, наращивать, преемственность

Мнемоника

  • Нити 糸 одежды, бросающиеся в глаза, выставленные напоказ 売, т.е. оборванные.

  • "Я продолжаю продавать 売 нити 糸."

Варианты

續, 续

Radicals: 糸, 売  (thread, sell)
Meaning Mnemonic
You have to sell thread if you want to continue to live. You want to make a living don’t you? Make sure you continue to sell that thread every single day!
Imagine selling thread so you can continue living your life.
Reading Mnemonic
You have to continue to sell that thread because a Bosozoku (ぞく) bike gang is forcing you to do it. You see? If you want to continue to live, you have to appease this Bosozoku gang. You better keep selling!
Continue selling thread and paying off the Bosozoku. It’s the only way you can continue to survive!
